text: The 1914–15 Bradford City A.F.C. season was the 12th in the club's history. The club finished 10th in Division One, and reached the 4th round of the FA Cup.Frost, p. 192 Prior to the start of the season the club undertook a 10 match tour of continental Europe, the third such tour in their history, winning 9 games.Frost, p. 19 ==Sources== * ==References== Category:Bradford City A.F.C. seasons Bradford City
title: 1914–15 Bradford City A.F.C. season
